title: Thomas Ferguson: Making Sense of the 2020 Presidential Election
itunes:title: Thomas Ferguson: Making Sense of the 2020 Presidential Election
description: INET's Research Director Thomas Ferguson talks about the research he and his collaborators Paul Jorgensen and Jie Chen conducted of the 2020 election and some of overlooked factors that were at play in that election.
content:encoded: INET's Research Director Thomas Ferguson talks about the research he and his collaborators Paul Jorgensen and Jie Chen conducted of the 2020 election and some of overlooked factors that were at play in that election.
